Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Milestones.Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Title: Establishes regional economic development councils and ethics and financial disclosure requirements for their members
Summary: Establishes regional economic development councils and ethics and financial disclosure requirements for their members.
LawCode: Add §§11, 233 & 234, Ec Dev L; amd §§73-a & 74, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law and the public officers law, in relation to the establishment of regional economic development councils; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
